attributes.action: Theresa May should not be Prime Minister.  We must have a Brexit Prime Minister
attributes.background: Since the result of the EU Referendum was LEAVE, and the fact that Theresa May was for REMAIN, many people feel she is not the right leader for this country.  We need be confident that our new Prime Minister is positive about UK leaving the EU, and this is not Theresa May

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
